snippet: A senior police official linked to the disgraced Communist Party official Bo Xilai hanged himself in a hotel room last week, the state news media reported Monday.
abstract: Zhou Yu, senior Chinese police official linked to disgraced Communist Party official Bo Xilai, is found to have hung himself in hotel room.
lead_paragraph: A senior police official linked to the disgraced Communist Party official Bo Xilai hanged himself in a hotel room last week, the state news media reported Monday.

headline.main: China: Suicide Victim Linked to Official
headline.print_headline: China: Suicide Victim Linked to Official
